alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kimble and Mason Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 912 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yates Crossing, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mason, Art, Loyal Valley, Yates Crossing, London, Streeter, Hedwigs Hill, Hilda, Us-87 Near The Mason- Gillespie County Line and Koockville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
